Type.Name: IdleHandler

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IdleHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Delegate to invoke during idle time

remarks.para: The handler specified by the delegate will be invoked during the GLib main loop execution. If the handler returns the handler is kept for another round of Idle execution, if is returned, the handler is removed.
